title: Enrique Iglesias flashes his six-pack abs while being tickled by his twins in adorable new video
text:
Enrique Iglesias had his twin toddlers in hysterics during a tickle-fest.

The 44-year-old singer shared a sweet new video with his daughter Lucy and her twin brother, Nicholas, tickling him on social media Tuesday.

There was not a dad bod in sight as the Hero crooner flashed some impressive six-pack abs in the adorable clip.

Fun! Enrique Iglesias shared a sweet new video with his daughter Lucy and her twin brother, Nicholas, tickling him on social media Tuesday

In the video, Enrique repeatedly lifts up his T-shirt so his twins can lean in to tickle him.

When their little fingers touch him, he makes a funny noise and shivers which leaves them both in a fit of giggles.

The precious moment appeared to have been captured at the Miami home that he shares with Anna Kournikova.

The tennis star gave birth to the twins, who will turn two in just a few months, back in December 2017.

Impressive: Enrique hasn't embraced the 'dad bod' and he flashed his impressive muscled abdominals

Loving it! The father of two had his twins laughing and giggling while he pretended to be zapped when they tickled him

Cutie! Iglesias shares the twins, who will be two in December, with partner Anna Kournikova

The two tend to keep off of social media and stray away from sharing photos of their kids.

Enrique is set to kick off a short world tour that will take him through Europe through 2020.

The Spanish musician is heading to Greece at the end of October and will then perform in Romania, Slovakia and Italy as his first few stops.

Loving it! The kids seemed to have a great time with dad in the video that looked like it was shot in his Miami, Florida mansion

Low key: The celebrity couple tends to keep themselves and their family out of the public eye so the video is a rare occurrence

Heading out: The doting dad will be leaving home soon to kick off a world tour later this month

Fans can expect to hear all their favorites on the tour as his set list is bound to be his most popular jams.

Earlier this month, the son of legend Julio Iglesias, released a Greatest Hits album.

'Greatest Hits 1999-2014,' he wrote on social media when the album debuted. 'Thank you guys for all the love and support throughout the years!!'

On stage: The Spanish musician is heading to Greece at the end of October and will then perform in Romania, Slovakia and Italy as his first few stops (Pictured in 2018)

Back home in Miami, the star lives with his partner Anna Kournikova.

He first met the tennis player back in 2001 when she starred in his music video, Escape. They quickly hit it off and made their red carpet debut just one year later.

The couple never officially confirmed their engagement but Anna was spotted for the first time rocking a ring on that finger back in 2004.
description: Enrique Iglesias shared a sweet new video with his daughter Lucy and her twin brother, Nicholas, tickling him on social media Tuesday.
